item.title: Building A Todo List with Python and Flask
item.description: Introduction NB: The full source code to this application is available on github. The TODO List is a perrenial favorite of developers looking to learn a new language, framework, or technique. I recently joined a team that uses Python as one of their languages, and decided to create my own implementation of a basic todo list using python3 and Flask in order to hone my very rusty skills with dynamically typed OO languages.
